Introduction
============

collective.js.galleryview is a javascript resource package of GalleryView JQueryPlugin.

GalleryView aims to provide jQuery users with a flexible, attractive content gallery that is both easy to implement and a snap to customize.

More information available at http://spaceforaname.com/galleryview & http://plugins.jquery.com/project/galleryview

Shipped version: 2.0

GalleryView is available for use in all personal and commercial projects under the MIT license.

http://www.spaceforaname.com/jquery/galleryview/js/jquery-galleryview-1.1/LICENSE.txt
